NK087(shu)004:1: // slob dpon d+harma b+ho d+his mdzad pa'i gsang ba'i don bsdus zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)004:2: bcom ldan 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po
NK087(shu)004:3: shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal
NK087(shu)004:4: lo // mnyam nyid chos sku gsang ba'i sku //
NK087(shu)004:5: longs spyod rdzogs sku sprul pa'i sku //
NK087(shu)004:6: sku lnga'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das //
NK087(shu)004:7: kun bzang ngang la phyag btsal te //
NK087(shu)004:8: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa kun 'dus las //
NK087(shu)004:9: mdo don chos kyi rnam grol sgo //
NK087(shu)004:10: de shes de 'jug bde sgrub phyir //
NK087(shu)004:11: mi 'gal tsam du bsdus te bshad //
NK087(shu)004:12: kun bzang thugs rjes 'gro don du //
NK087(shu)004:13: theg pa gsum snang 'dul mdzad pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:14: don dam nges pa'i theg mchog las //
NK087(shu)004:15: gsang sgo mtshon pa'i mdo rgyud don //
NK087(shu)004:16: rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste //
NK087(shu)004:17: bya ba'i gzhi dang byed pa'i rkyen //
NK087(shu)004:18: bya bral 'bras bu'i mthar phyin dag /ji snyed chos kyi rtsa bar bshad //
NK087(shu)004:19: phyi nang bye brag ji snyed pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:20: chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems //
NK087(shu)004:21: ji bzhin ngang du ye gnas pa //
NK087(shu)004:22: shes par bya ba'i rgyud don yin //
NK087(shu)004:24: theg pa de ni bya byed rkyen //
NK087(shu)004:25: gzhan du 'bras bu re rtsol med //
NK087(shu)004:26: bsgrub bya nyid la lam gnas pas //
NK087(shu)004:27: thabs chen theg 'di bya bral ba'o //
NK087(shu)004:28: de yang phyi nang gnyis la yang //
NK087(shu)004:29: gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu yi //
NK087(shu)004:30: tshul gsum bye brag chos su bshad //
NK087(shu)004:31: gzhi ni snga ma'i don nyid de //
NK087(shu)004:32: thabs ni lam yin rnam pa gsum //
NK087(shu)004:33: gol sgrib ngo bo yan lag ste //
NK087(shu)004:34: gol sa ltung ba'i sgo dgu dang //
NK087(shu)004:35: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sogs dang //
NK087(shu)004:36: thun mong rtog pa brgyad cu gcig /dgu bcu la sogs skyon rnams dang //
NK087(shu)004:37: shes pa'i bye brag drug la sogs //
NK087(shu)004:38: mi mthun gol sgrib phyogs su bshad //
NK087(shu)004:39: ngo bo thabs dang shes rab ste //
NK087(shu)004:40: rol pa'i ka ra la sogs pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:41: man ngag thabs kyi bder 'jug dang //
NK087(shu)004:42: thos bsam sgom pa'i tshul 'gro ba'o //
NK087(shu)004:43: de ni 'jug pa rnam gsum ste //
NK087(shu)004:44: rtog dpyod don dang yi ge yi //
NK087(shu)004:46: blo yi stobs kyis rnam pa gnyis //
NK087(shu)004:47: lus las snang ba'i chos rnams la //
NK087(shu)004:48: rig pa'i gtan tshigs mtha' dag dang //
NK087(shu)004:49: man ngag nges pa'i tshad ma yis //
NK087(shu)004:50: so sor rtog dang rtsol med par //
NK087(shu)004:51: rim dang gcig car gtan la 'bebs //
NK087(shu)004:52: de nas 'jug pa'i tshul sgo ni //
NK087(shu)004:53: don la rim dang gcig pa'o //
NK087(shu)004:54: don ni chos nyid snying po la //
NK087(shu)004:55: rjes su 'jug pa sems min te //
NK087(shu)004:56: de yang skabs kyi khyad par gyis //
NK087(shu)004:57: lam lnga'i skabs dang bcur 'gyur bas //
NK087(shu)004:58: rim par bgrod pa'i lam du bshad //
NK087(shu)004:60: yul dang shes pa'i tshul ltar bu //
NK087(shu)004:61: ji bzhin pa la blo bzhag pas //
NK087(shu)004:62: rig pa'i khyad par skabs su 'phags //
NK087(shu)004:63: gsal dang brtan dang yun ring dang //
NK087(shu)004:64: shin tu rigs dang tshad las 'das //
NK087(shu)004:65: mi mthun phyogs dang phrad pa'i tshe //
NK087(shu)004:66: de dbang gyur dang cung zad du //
NK087(shu)004:67: mi 'gyur thang cig gnas pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:68: gsal bar brtan pa'i rim goms dang //
NK087(shu)004:69: rang dbang gyur nas ches brtan dang //
NK087(shu)004:70: spyod lam kun tu rlung gnas yin //
NK087(shu)004:71: de dag zag bcas bsam gtan te //
NK087(shu)004:72: gnyis med yul bral de mthong min //
NK087(shu)004:73: mnyam nyid gsang ba'i bde don la //
NK087(shu)004:74: dad dang mos dang der rtsol dang //
NK087(shu)004:75: des de g.yos dang cher g.yos dang //
NK087(shu)004:77: skar phran 'bring dang chen po dang //
NK087(shu)004:78: gcig pa gnyis pa'i zla ba 'dra //
NK087(shu)004:79: rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du //
NK087(shu)004:80: gsal bar mthong bas dbugs phyin te //
NK087(shu)004:82: gsum pa'i ri bong spyan 'dra yin //
NK087(shu)004:83: mthong ba'i don la mnyam gnas pas //
NK087(shu)004:84: brtan par 'gyur te lung chen thob //
NK087(shu)004:86: rang dang spyi yi tha snyad bral //
NK087(shu)004:87: dmigs med kun gsal ye shes nyid //
NK087(shu)004:88: g.yo dang thob dang brtan rdzogs pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:89: rim pas mthar phyin gsum du snang //
NK087(shu)004:90: lnga brgyad bcu drug tshul du gsal //
NK087(shu)004:91: de dag pa dang rnal 'byor skabs //
NK087(shu)004:92: sems lam bcu dang lnga zhes bya //
NK087(shu)004:93: yang dag blo chen mngon rtogs pas //
NK087(shu)004:94: mnyam nyid yul bral rang gsal bar //
NK087(shu)004:95: mi g.yo cig char gang 'jug pa //
NK087(shu)004:96: sa dang lam gyi grangs rtsol med //
NK087(shu)004:97: ye shes mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dag /blo yi khyad par ches phra ba'i //
NK087(shu)004:98: thams cad gsal rdzogs cig char dang //
NK087(shu)004:99: lnga dang bcu la sogs par snang //
NK087(shu)004:101: sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang //
NK087(shu)004:102: sgrib dang gol sa rtogs pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:103: spyod dang ting 'dzin dam tshig dang //
NK087(shu)004:104: dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang //
NK087(shu)004:105: lta ba'i khyad par gnas 'gyur sogs //
NK087(shu)004:106: bye brag lam lnga'i chos su snang //
NK087(shu)004:107: rnal 'byor sa bcu'i lam rnams la'ang //
NK087(shu)004:108: khyad par de dag rnam bcur gsal //
NK087(shu)004:109: lha yi phyag rgya gcig pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:110: gnyis 'brel yan lag rdzogs pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:111: 'khor lo gcig dang rnam spros dang //
NK087(shu)004:112: shin tu rnam spros dkyil 'khor dang //
NK087(shu)004:113: gling gcig gang dang stong gsum dang //
NK087(shu)004:114: grangs med shin tu grangs med dang //
NK087(shu)004:115: chos dbyings mtha' yas rab gsal rdzogs //
NK087(shu)004:116: de dag rnam pa'i khyad par yang //
NK087(shu)004:117: rtog dang mtshan ma'i rnam par dang //
NK087(shu)004:118: chu zla lta bur bzung med dang //
NK087(shu)004:119: gzung 'dzin gnyis bral de nyid dang //
NK087(shu)004:120: ci la'ang mi gnas mnyam nyid dang //
NK087(shu)004:121: rang gi mtshan nyid gsal nges dang //
NK087(shu)004:122: zag pa med dang lhun grub pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:123: rab 'bring tha ma'i rim pa yis //
NK087(shu)004:124: thob dang shin tu thob pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:125: bstan rdzogs nyid de rnam bcu'o //
NK087(shu)004:126: tsad kyang gru bzhi brgyad cu drug /sum cu gnyis dang drug cu bzhi //
NK087(shu)004:127: de bzhin 'gyur sogs chos dbyings rnams //
NK087(shu)004:129: dri sgra gzugs sogs rim bzhin 'phags //
NK087(shu)004:130: de dag blo yi rtsal yin te //
NK087(shu)004:131: shes rab la sogs kun de bzhin //
NK087(shu)004:133: don dang yi ge gang de yang //
NK087(shu)004:134: so so'i gnas skabs lam bdag nyid //
NK087(shu)004:135: bgrod dang de chos ldan pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:136: rgyud mi gtong dang rten byed dang //
NK087(shu)004:137: dus de skabs dang 'bras bu dang //
NK087(shu)004:138: gags dang 'dra ba'i ltung gnas dang //
NK087(shu)004:139: rtsol zhing bgrod pa'i lam sems dang //
NK087(shu)004:140: spyod lam dang ni blo gnas dang //
NK087(shu)004:141: mi 'da' bsrung dang dus nyid dang //
NK087(shu)004:142: yon tan mthu dang bya bral dang //
NK087(shu)004:143: shes rab stobs dang khyad par las //
NK087(shu)004:144: tha snyad bye brag rnams su gsungs //
NK087(shu)004:145: gzhan yang sems bskyed sngags la sogs //
NK087(shu)004:146: lam gyi chos sgo tha snyad kun //
NK087(shu)004:147: lnga dang bcu sogs grags pa yin //
NK087(shu)004:148: dang po gnyis la gnas pa ni //
NK087(shu)004:149: gsang chen 'bras bu lam gyi rten //
NK087(shu)004:150: de bzhin rim par bgrod gnas na //
NK087(shu)004:151: ltung yang gzugs kyi zin pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:152: lus ngan mi srid bde 'gro yis //
NK087(shu)004:153: yang dag gnas dang 'dod rigs sogs //
NK087(shu)004:154: bde 'gro'i gnas ngan mi srid dang //
NK087(shu)004:155: khams gsum 'jig tshogs zag bral dang //
NK087(shu)004:156: mi ldog mi gnas phyir 'ong dang //
NK087(shu)004:157: mi shes skyon bral mtha' rdzogs nas //
NK087(shu)004:158: sa sar mi ldog sangs rgyas sar //
NK087(shu)004:159: thogs med mngon gyur lhun gyis grub //
NK087(shu)004:160: de phyir lam gyi mchog tu brjod //
NK087(shu)004:161: de rkyen yan lag rnam pa gnyis //
NK087(shu)004:162: sgrub byed rkyen dang shes byed pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:163: lam gyi yan lag sum cu gnyis //
NK087(shu)004:164: mdo dang gzhi dang bslab pa'i mtha' //mdo ni bcu gnyis 'jug sgo dang //
NK087(shu)004:165: dam tshig lta ba ting 'dzin dang //
NK087(shu)004:166: dmigs pa bzlas pa phran las dang //
NK087(shu)004:167: spyod pa dang ni thob bya'i dbang //
NK087(shu)004:168: rig 'dzin sa dang sangs rgyas sa //
NK087(shu)004:169: nges 'byed yan lag dag tu bshad //
NK087(shu)004:170: gzhi ni rnam bcu sgrub pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:171: gsang sngags ming dang spyod pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:172: dngos grub gnas dang bzlas pa'i sgra //
NK087(shu)004:173: phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta ba dang //
NK087(shu)004:174: cho 'phrul dag ste de dag ston //
NK087(shu)004:175: dpe bcus mtshon nas rab tu shes //
NK087(shu)004:176: bslab pa'i mtha' ni rnam bcu ste //
NK087(shu)004:177: dam tshig gzhi dang rgyud dgrol dang //
NK087(shu)004:178: sgo mo bsdur dang phul dbyung dang //
NK087(shu)004:179: thag bcad pa dang nyams blangs dang //
NK087(shu)004:180: la dor spyod dang dbang rim dang //
NK087(shu)004:181: man ngag don dang mdor bsdus rnams //
NK087(shu)004:182: rnal 'byor bslab pa'i mtha' bcur bshad //
NK087(shu)004:183: gzhi 'dzin sa ni dam tshig ste //
NK087(shu)004:184: sgo gsum sdam par gnas pa'i don //
NK087(shu)004:185: rtsa ba yan lag la sogs pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:186: bsrung dang sgrub pa de nyid do //
NK087(shu)004:187: rgyud dgrol ba ni thos bsam ste //
NK087(shu)004:188: mkhas ldan dam pa'i bla ma la //
NK087(shu)004:189: dad dang srid zhu gus pa yis //
NK087(shu)004:191: sgo bsdur ba ni theg pa rnams //
NK087(shu)004:192: shes par byed dang rtsol ba ste //
NK087(shu)004:193: gol sgrib phyogs su gang gsung dag /gcad phyir de dag rig shes 'byed //
NK087(shu)004:194: phul du dbyung ba 'di don nyid //
NK087(shu)004:195: mkhas shing rab tu shes pa'o //
NK087(shu)004:196: thag bcad pa ni lta ba ste //
NK087(shu)004:197: ji bzhin ma nor shes rab nyid //
NK087(shu)004:198: re dogs med par bsngo 'gro don //
NK087(shu)004:199: nyams blang ba ni ting 'dzin te /
NK087(shu)004:200: phyag rgya bzhi sogs spros pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:201: spros med la sogs bsam gtan yin //
NK087(shu)004:202: la dor ba ni spyod pa ste //
NK087(shu)004:203: dkyil 'khor bzhi dang las bzhi dang //
NK087(shu)004:204: sgrub pa la sogs bye brag dang //
NK087(shu)004:205: thun mong thabs kyi mdzad spyod nyid //
NK087(shu)004:206: dbang ni rim par bgrod byed pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:207: lnga dang lnga sogs nus mthu bskyed //
NK087(shu)004:208: man ngag don sgrub thabs kyi mchog /gser 'gyur bdud rtsi lta bu'i tshul //
NK087(shu)004:209: mdor bsdu ba ni sems kyi don //
NK087(shu)004:210: ji bzhin ngang rtogs kun 'dus pa'i //
NK087(shu)004:211: shes byed yan lag rnam pa gnyis //
NK087(shu)004:212: mtshon byed tshig don yi ge'i sgra //
NK087(shu)004:213: rgyud don yan lag rnam drug dang //
NK087(shu)004:215: lde mig ces su grags pa de //
NK087(shu)004:216: rgyud ni byin rlabs 'byung ba dang //
NK087(shu)004:217: lung bstan brgyud pa rnam gnyis phyir //
NK087(shu)004:218: de 'grel ba yang rnam pa gnyis //
NK087(shu)004:219: byin rlabs sku bzhi bstan pa dag /bshad thabs lde mig rnam gnyis te //
NK087(shu)004:222: nges pa 'byin pa rnam gsum mo //
NK087(shu)004:223: sgo gnyis spyi dang khyad par te //
NK087(shu)004:224: spyi yi rnam gsum yan lag mdo //
NK087(shu)004:225: rtsa ba dag gis 'grel bar byed //
NK087(shu)004:226: khyad par gsang sgo'i rnam 'grel yang //
NK087(shu)004:227: yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba yis //
NK087(shu)004:229: byed pa rgyu dang rtsa ba dang /
NK087(shu)004:230: 'brel dang tshig dang nges par sbyor //
NK087(shu)004:231: rgyu ni gling bzhi drug yin te //
NK087(shu)004:232: don gang gang tshe gang nyid kyis //
NK087(shu)004:233: gang du gang la bshad brjod pa'o //
NK087(shu)004:234: rtsa ba gleng bslang rkyen nyid dang //
NK087(shu)004:235: ji ltar bslangs nas zhus bshad tshul //
NK087(shu)004:236: 'grel ba gang brjod gang gis brjod //
NK087(shu)004:237: gang phyir gang gi stobs kyis bshad //
NK087(shu)004:238: 'dren pa brjod pa'i rgyu 'di dag /ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul bcu ste //
NK087(shu)004:239: rang bzhin lta ba'i nges don dang //
NK087(shu)004:240: spyi don sdud dang rnam par dbye //
NK087(shu)004:242: rang lugs nyid dang brgal lan dang //
NK087(shu)004:243: ldem dgongs brda dang dpes mtshon dang //
NK087(shu)004:244: man ngag gab sbas 'byin sdebs rnams //
NK087(shu)004:245: dpe bcu lta bur bshad pa'o //
NK087(shu)004:246: nges pa gtan tshigs rnam bcu gnyis //
NK087(shu)004:247: snod sgo bzhi la bstan pa bzhi //
NK087(shu)004:249: lus dang don dang rig pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:250: mtshon dpe gtan tshigs mtha' dag gis //
NK087(shu)004:252: de dag re re'ang dgos pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:253: ngo bo nges tshig dmigs bzung bcas //
NK087(shu)004:254: rnam bcu gnyis kyi nges 'byed shes //
NK087(shu)004:255: sbyor ba byang chub yan lag ste //
NK087(shu)004:256: rtogs pa bzhi dang mtshan nyid bzhi //
NK087(shu)004:257: dgos 'brel bzhi dang yan lag bzhi //
NK087(shu)004:258: der lung bzhi dang mtshan dpe bzhi //
NK087(shu)004:259: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi dag dang //
NK087(shu)004:260: mtshan nyid tshul dang sbyor ba ni //
NK087(shu)004:261: rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams //
NK087(shu)004:262: gzhi nyid 'grel dang zag bcas dang //
NK087(shu)004:263: mthong dang sgom dang mthar phyin dang //
NK087(shu)004:264: sangs rgyas sa dang rnam drug tu //
NK087(shu)004:265: bsdus te de yi yan lag yin //
NK087(shu)004:266: cho 'phrul bzhi dang mngon shes lnga //
NK087(shu)004:267: thabs dang thabs sbyar lnga lnga dang //
NK087(shu)004:268: rang bzhin lnga dang phrin las bzhi //
NK087(shu)004:269: gzhan don spyod pa'i yan lag ste //
NK087(shu)004:270: bla med sbyor ba'i chos 'grel yin //
NK087(shu)004:271: mdo bzhi thos mthong mngon sum dang //
NK087(shu)004:272: bya ba med dang rnam bzhir 'grel //
NK087(shu)004:273: rtsa ba nges pa'i man ngag gsum //
NK087(shu)004:274: mi mthun phyogs rnams bcad pa dang //
NK087(shu)004:275: don mthun 'gro ba'i dpes mtshon dang //
NK087(shu)004:276: nges pa'i don la gnas pa yi //
NK087(shu)004:278: lung bstan brgyud pa'i bstan pa yang //
NK087(shu)004:279: de bzhin tshul du 'grel ba ste //
NK087(shu)004:280: rgyud don rnam gsum khungs dang rgyu //
NK087(shu)004:281: ngo bo nyid de dang po ni //
NK087(shu)004:282: thun mong bcas gzhi spyi rgyud do //
NK087(shu)004:283: gdams ngag lung bstan rtsa ba'i rgyud //
NK087(shu)004:284: gleng gzhi spyi yi rgyud ces bya //
NK087(shu)004:286: bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen te //
NK087(shu)004:287: ngo bo tshogs pa drug nyid do //
NK087(shu)004:288: gleng bslang la sogs drug rnams dang //
NK087(shu)004:289: mdo bzhi rtsa ba gsum la sogs //
NK087(shu)004:290: tshul bzhin rjes su sbyar ba bya //
NK087(shu)004:291: de dag 'bras bu'i lam du bshad //
NK087(shu)004:292: 'bras bu nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK087(shu)004:293: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang //
NK087(shu)004:294: nyi shu lngar bsdus mtha' yas rnams //
NK087(shu)004:295: lhun rdzogs rnam kun mkhyen pa'o //
NK087(shu)004:296: gsang mchog gsang dag bka' lung mdo rgyud do //
NK087(shu)004:297: gsang bsdus gsal bshad mdo tsam phyogs brjod pa /
NK087(shu)004:298: ma nor mi 'gal tsam du nyams kyis bstan //
NK087(shu)004:299: de yi dge ba gang mchis yongs la bsngo //
NK087(shu)004:300: gsang ba'i mdo don bsdus pa slob dpon d+harma b+ho d+his mdzad pa rdzogs so //
